title: Stream: How To Dress Well – Total Loss
content:
It feels like I’ve been waiting for this record from the very second that I finished my premiere listen of How To Dress Well’s debut LP, Love Remains, back in 2010.

Total Loss is a more mature and considered album, with increased continuity between tracks, yet still relying upon Krell’s minimal approach, replicating the transcendental nature of his first outing. Head to his Official Website to purchase Total Loss, and stream the record in it’s entirety below, as well as forthcoming tour dates.
